mapper.select: SELECT A.feed_comment_id AS feedCommentId , A.comment , B.user_id AS writerUserId , IF(B.nick_name IS NULL , B.uid , B.nick_name) AS writerNm , B.pic AS writerPic FROM feed_comments A JOIN user B ON A.user_id = B.user_id WHERE feed_id = #{feedId} ORDER BY feed_comment_id DESC LIMIT #{startIdx} , #{size}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM feed_comments WHERE feed_comment_id AS feedCommentId
